string.value: Muirhat is worried about the evil spirits that have infiltrated Victoria Island as of late. I wonder what I could do to help? I should go talk to Muirhat on the top deck of The Nautilus.

Victoria Island has already been infused with evil spirits. But I refuse to give up like this. I need to eliminate #r80 Stone Golems#k to stop these evil creatures from further spreading their evilness in Victoria Island. \n\n#o 5130101# #r#a21981##k
I've eliminated 100 Stone Golems. I wonder if I've made a difference in Victoria Island?
오랜만일세. 어쩐일로 나를 찾아왔나? 흐음… 내가 요새 그렇게 표정이 좋지 못하였나. 내가 근심이 많아 보인다는 소문이 퍼져서 멀리 있던 자네까지 찾아오게 하다니… 후…
다름이 아니라 검은 마법사의 악의 기운이 빅토리아 아일랜드 깊은 곳까지 스며들어서 걱정이 많다네. 자네라면 날 도와서 섬의 깊은 곳까지 가서 악의 기운이 더 이상 퍼지지 않도록 할 수 있을 것 같은데… 이곳까지 찾아온 김에 날 도와주게.
고맙군. 그렇다면 우선 스톤골렘을 해치워주게. 돌처럼 단단한 녀석들이라 요새 애먹고 있네. #r스톤골렘 100마리#k를 해치워 나에게 돌아오면 후하게 보답해주지. 하하.
다른 일이 많나 보군. 어쩔 수 없지. 다른 용사들을 찾아봐야겠군.

It has been a while. What brought you here? Hmmm... do I really have that look of concern? Everyone has been talking about how I seem to be in distress. I guess the words reached far enough that you made your way here... sigh...

What it is is that the evil spiritis of the Black Magician penetrated deep into Victoria Island, and that concerns me a lot. I feel that you may be capable of helping me stop the spreading of the evil spirits reaching the deepest part of the island. Will you help me do that?

Thank you. First, I want you to defeat some Stone Golems. They are rock hard, and that's giving me some trouble. Please defeat #r100 Stone Golems#k and then come back. I will reward you handsomely for your effort.
You must be busy with other endeavors. That's unfortunate. I'll just have to look for other willing warriors.
That was fast. I knew you'd be able to do it. Hopefully your efforts will result in bringing in peace on Victoria Island.
Once you make yourself more powerful, I'll contact you again for more help.
Please defeat 100 Stone Golems. They can be found in the deepest part of Victoria Island.
